issue.title: www.timeanddate.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.timeanddate.com/custom/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.timeanddate.com%2Fcustom%2F) ### Comment > Not able to use the button to sign in, when clicking on the buttons. I did not use Facebook/google/amazon to set account up, I had created a username and password. ### Screenshots

Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/zDN4Irj.png)

issue.title: kanri.rikunabi.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://kanri.rikunabi.com/2024/rms/topMenu/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fkanri.rikunabi.com%2F2024%2Frms%2FtopMenu%2F) ### Comment > https://kanri.rikunabi.com/2024/rms/topMenu/でログイン時、5分以上かかって表示されるか、タイムアウトとなります。バージョン7.11以降で発生します。httpsフィルターのホワイトリストに追加しても正常表示できません。MFPネットワークドライバの使用をオフにすると、正常表示されるようです。MFPネットワークドライバを使用をONにしたまま使用するにしたいです。 ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/HT9ue5H.jpg)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/HT9ue5H.jpg)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.12bate Browser: | Edge AdGuard driver: | WFP Stealth mode options: | Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header,
Self-destructing first-party cookies (180) DNS filtering: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection

Other:
AdGuard Experimental

Language-specific:
AdGuard Japanese,
AdGuard Chinese Userscripts: | extra・ポップアップブロッカー・Web Trust
